view.name: BehaviorInfo2v
view.columns: (BehaviorInfo2_Idn, Computer_Idn, AgentBehavior_Idn, Revision, Name, dbRevision, BehaviorTypeName, Prefix, BehaviorType, Guid)

schema.view: Select bi.BehaviorInfo2_Idn, bi.Computer_Idn, bi.AgentBehavior_Idn, bi.Revision, ab.Name, ab.Revision as dbRevision, bt.Name as BehaviorTypeName, bt.Prefix, ab.BehaviorType, ab.Guid FROM BehaviorInfo2 bi LEFT OUTER JOIN AgentBehavior ab on bi.AgentBehavior_Idn = ab.AgentBehavior_Idn LEFT OUTER JOIN BehaviorType bt ON ab.BehaviorType = bt.BehaviorType

column.name: WakeOnNetAccessThresholdAC
column.displayName: Wake On Net Access Threshold AC

column.name: WakeOnNetAccessThresholdACSpec
column.displayName: Wake On Net Access Threshold AC Specified

column.name: WakeOnNetAccessSleepTimer
column.displayName: Wake On Net Access Sleep Timer

column.name: WakeOnNetAccessSleepTimerSpec
column.displayName: Wake On Net Access Sleep Timer Specified

column.name: IsAMTDDNSUpdateEnabled
column.displayName: Is AMT Dynamic DNS Update Enabled

column.name: IsAMTEACEnabled
column.displayName: Is AMT Endpoint Access Control Enabled

column.name: IsCILASupported
column.displayName: Is Client Initiated Local Access Supported

view.name: ClientAuthStatusV
view.columns: (ClientAuthStatus_Idn, Computer_Idn, AuthRequired, AuthSucceeded, CertResult_ID, AuthDate, CertResultV)

schema.view: select c.ClientAuthStatus_Idn, c.Computer_Idn, c.AuthRequired, c.AuthSucceeded, cas.CertResult_ID, c.AuthDate, cas.DisplayName as CertResultV from ClientAuthStatus c left join ClientAuthStatusEnum cas on cas.CertResult_ID = c.CertResult_ID

column.name: PrivDiskPWAssign
column.displayName: Private Disk Admin Access Password Assigned

column.name: LastEnrollmentDateExt
column.displayName: Last Enrollment Time with External System

column.name: LastSyncDateExt
column.displayName: Last Sync Date with External System

view.name: CSEP_Elections_V
view.columns: (CSEP_Elections_Idn, Computer_Idn, ElectionDate, LastReportDate, ServiceStatus, SubnetService, Subnet, ServiceName, Enabled, SettingsXml)

schema.view: SELECT ce.CSEP_Elections_Idn, ce.Computer_Idn, ce.ElectionDate, ce.LastReportDate, ce.ServiceStatus, cs.SubnetService, cs.Subnet, cs.ServiceName, cs.Enabled, cs.SettingsXml FROM CSEP_Subnets cs LEFT OUTER JOIN CSEP_Elections ce ON ce.SubnetService = cs.SubnetService

value.AttrName: Custom Data - Security Scan - Pending File Rename
Custom Data - Image - Image Time Stamp
Custom Data - LANDesk - Inventory Scan Command
Custom Data - Windows - Offline Files Status
Custom Data - LANDesk - Deferred Repair Task

schema.view: select User_Customgroup_Idn as CustomGroup_Idn, LD_Task_Idn as Member_Idn from LD_Task Where User_Customgroup_Idn > 0

view.name: FileConnectionsV
view.columns: (Computer_Idn, FileConnections_Idn, FileConnection, ExeName, RemoteIP, RemoteHost, FirstConnect, LastConnect, ConnectCnt, Suspicious, InfoXml, FileSize, Title, Vendor, Version, FileName, FileInfo_Idn, MD5Hash, SHA1Hash, SHA256Hash)

schema.view: SELECT COMPUTER_IDN, FILECONNECTIONS_IDN, FILECONNECTION, CASE WHEN B.TITLE = D.ORIGINALTITLE THEN D.NEWTITLE ELSE B.TITLE END AS EXENAME, A.REMOTEIP, A.REMOTEHOST, A.FIRSTCONNECT, A.LASTCONNECT, A.CONNECTCNT, A.SUSPICIOUS, A.INFOXML, B.FILESIZE, CASE WHEN D.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL THEN D.NEWTITLE ELSE B.TITLE END AS TITLE, CASE WHEN (C.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL) THEN C.NEWVENDOR WHEN (D.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL) THEN D.NEWVENDOR ELSE B.VENDOR END AS VENDOR, B.VERSION, B.FILENAME, A.FILEINFO_IDN, B.MD5HASH, B.SHA1HASH, B.SHA256HASH from FILECONNECTIONS A JOIN FILEINFO B ON A.FILEINFO_IDN = B.FILEINFO_IDN LEFT JOIN ALIAS C on (B.VENDOR = C.ORIGINALVENDOR and C.ORIGINALTITLE IS NULL) LEFT JOIN ALIAS D ON (B.VENDOR = D.ORIGINALVENDOR and B.TITLE = D.ORIGINALTITLE)

value.EXE_NAME: Scheduled Task Handler Global Scheduler Server

view.name: LD_TASK_MACHINE_V
view.columns: (LD_TASK_IDN, Computer_Idn, STAGE, MAC_STATUS, MAC_RETCODE, PackageName, MAC_WOKE_UP, STATUS_TIME, RETCODE_MESSAGE, CUSTOM_MESSAGE, APM_POLICY_USERS_IDN, SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_IDN, PACKAGE_IDN, PolicyStartTime, TaskName, TaskStartTime, LDAPName, LDAPSourceType, LDAPSourceIdn)

schema.view: Select ltm.LD_TASK_IDN, ltm.Computer_Idn, ltm.STAGE, ltm.MAC_STATUS, ltm.MAC_RETCODE, pkg.NAME as PackageName, ltm.MAC_WOKE_UP, ltm.STATUS_TIME, ltm.RETCODE_MESSAGE, ltm.CUSTOM_MESSAGE, ltm.APM_POLICY_USERS_IDN, ltm.SOURCE_TYPE, ltm.SOURCE_IDN, ltm.PACKAGE_IDN, ltm.PolicyStartTime, lt.TASK_NAME as TaskName, lt.NEXT_START as TaskStartTime, apm.USER_NAME as LDAPName, ldap.ldap_source_type as LDAPSourceType, ldap.ldap_source_idn as LDAPSourceIdn from LD_TASK_MACHINE ltm LEFT OUTER JOIN apm_policy_users apm on ltm.Apm_Policy_Users_Idn = apm.Apm_Policy_Users_Idn LEFT OUTER JOIN ld_ldap_targets ldap on ltm.computer_idn = ldap.computer_idn AND ltm.LD_TASK_IDN = ldap.LD_TASK_IDN LEFT OUTER JOIN PACKAGE pkg on ltm.PACKAGE_IDN = pkg.PACKAGE_IDN, LD_TASK lt WHERE ltm.LD_TASK_IDN = lt.LD_TASK_IDN

view.name: LDAPUserAttrV
view.columns: (Computer_Idn, LDAPUserAttr_Idn, LDAPName, FirstName, LastName, Title, Manager, TelNumber, ShortName, EmailAddr, FullName, DisplayName, DomainEmail)

schema.view: select a.Computer_Idn, b.LDAPUserAttr_Idn, b.LDAPName, b.FirstName, b.LastName, b.Title, b.Manager, b.TelNumber, case when b.ShortName is null or b.ShortName = '' then a.PrimaryOwner else b.ShortName end ShortName, b.EmailAddr, a.FullName, CASE WHEN b.FirstName is not null AND LEN(b.FirstName) > 0 THEN b.FirstName + ISNULL(' ' + b.LastName,'') WHEN a.FullName is not null THEN a.FullName WHEN b.LDAPName is not null THEN b.LDAPName WHEN b.ShortName is null or b.ShortName = '' then a.PrimaryOwner ELSE b.ShortName END DisplayName, b.DomainEmail from Computer a left outer join LDAPUserAttr b on a.Computer_Idn = b.Computer_Idn

value.fieldContext: <launchpad> <!-- Install task IDN must be specified --> <InstallTaskIDN></InstallTaskIDN> <username>%HTTP_REMOTE_USER%</username> <computername>%HTTP_REMOTE_HOST%</computername> <taskidn>%QUERY_TaskIdn%</taskidn> </launchpad>

value.Name: Central European Standard Time
value.DisplayName: (GMT+01:00) Sarajevo, Skopje, Sofija, Vilnius, Warsaw, Zagreb

value.Name: GMT Standard Time
value.DisplayName: (GMT) Greenwich Mean Time : Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London

value.Name: W. Europe Standard Time
value.DisplayName: (GMT+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna

view.name: PackageWorkflowActionV
view.columns: (PackageWorkflowAction_Idn, Workflow_Idn, WorkflowStep_Idn, ContentToWorkflow_Idn, Package_Idn, StartDate, Action, ConsoleUser_Idn, TaskIdn, Detail, WorkflowName, StepName, ActionName, Owner, TaskName, PackageName)

schema.view: select c.PackageWorkflowAction_Idn, c.Workflow_Idn, c.WorkflowStep_Idn, c.ContentToWorkflow_Idn, c.Package_Idn, c.StartDate, c.Action, c.ConsoleUser_Idn, c.TaskIdn, c.Detail, w.Name, s.Name, ae.Name, u.UserName, t.TASK_NAME, p.Name as PackageName from PackageWorkflowAction c left join Workflow w on w.Workflow_Idn = c.Workflow_Idn left join WorkflowStep s on s.WorkflowStep_Idn = c.WorkflowStep_Idn left join WorkflowActionEnum ae on ae.Action = c.Action left join ConsoleUser u on u.ConsoleUser_Idn = c.ConsoleUser_Idn left join Package p on p.Package_idn = c.Package_idn left join LD_TASK t on c.TaskIdn = t.LD_TASK_IDN

view.name: PackageToWorkflowV
view.columns: (PackageToWorkflow_Idn, Package_Idn, WorkflowStep_Idn, PercentComplete, DeviceCountTotal,SampleSize,AppliedDate,MinimumAdvanceDate,MetMinimumDuration,MetSuccessCriteria,MetPostDuration,LastProcessedDate,ReasonDidntExit,Stopped,TaskIdn,BaggageXML, ApprovedDate, MetDateTimeWindow, Name, Description, Type, Guid, ContentType)

schema.view: select c.PackageToWorkflow_Idn, c.Package_Idn, c.WorkflowStep_Idn, c.PercentComplete, c.DeviceCountTotal,c.SampleSize,c.AppliedDate,c.MinimumAdvanceDate,c.MetMinimumDuration,c.MetSuccessCriteria,c.MetPostDuration,c.LastProcessedDate,c.ReasonDidntExit,c.Stopped,c.TaskIdn,c.BaggageXML, c.ApprovedDate, c.MetDateTimeWindow, p.Name, p.Description, p.Type, p.Guid, '' as ContentType from PackageToWorkflow c, Package p where c.Package_Idn = p.Package_Idn

column.name: PurchaseQuantity
column.desc: Number of licenses in original purchase.

column.name: SerialNumber
column.desc: Serial number or volume license number associated with the license.

column.name: OrderNumber
column.desc: Order number associated with the purchase.

column.name: Location
column.desc: Physical location of the license documentation.

column.name: SuiteAttributeMode
column.desc: this license can be applied to productsuite or single

column.name: ShipZip
column.desc: Shipping information zip code or postal code.

column.name: OrderLine
column.desc: Order line number of software license.

column.name: PurchasedBy
column.desc: Name of person purchasing this item.

column.name: LaunchCount
column.desc: How many times product is launched

column.name: MinutesUsed
column.desc: How long the product is used

column.name: EntryDate
column.desc: Date product was first found on computer.

value.Name: Sample MBSDK ColumnSet
value.QuerySQL: SELECT DISTINCT A0.DISPLAYNAME, A0.TYPE, A1.OSTYPE, A0.COMPUTER_IDN, A0.DEVICEID, A0.DEVICENAME, A0.LOGINNAME, A0.SWNUMFILES, A0.DOMAINNAME, A0.WORKGROUP, A1.VERSION, A2.VENDOR, A2.MODEL, A2.MHZSPEED, A3.BYTESTOTAL FROM Computer A0 (nolock) LEFT OUTER JOIN Operating_System A1 (nolock) ON A0.Computer_Idn = A1.Computer_Idn LEFT OUTER JOIN Processor A2 (nolock) ON A0.Computer_Idn = A2.Computer_Idn LEFT OUTER JOIN Memory A3 (nolock) ON A0.Computer_Idn = A3.Computer_Idn WHERE (A0.COMPUTER_IDN IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY A0.DISPLAYNAME

schema.view: select a.fileinfo_idn, a.filename, a.filesize, a.title, a.vendor, a.version, a.discovered, a.action, a.ScanMethod, a.UserEdit, case when c.originalvendor is not null then c.newtitle else a.title end as newtitle, case when (c.originalvendor is not null) then c.newvendor when (b.originalvendor is not null) then b.newvendor else a.vendor end as newvendor from fileinfo a left join alias b on (a.vendor = b.originalvendor and (b.originaltitle is null or b.originaltitle = '') ) left join alias c on (a.vendor = c.originalvendor and a.title = c.originaltitle)

select a.fileinfo_idn, a.filename, a.filesize, a.title, a.vendor, a.version, a.discovered, a.action, a.scanmethod, a.useredit, case when c.originalvendor is not null then c.newtitle else a.title end as newtitle, case when (c.originalvendor is not null) then c.newvendor when (b.originalvendor is not null) then b.newvendor else a.vendor end as newvendor from fileinfo a, alias b, alias c where (a.vendor = b.originalvendor (+) and b.originaltitle (+) is null) and (a.vendor = c.originalvendor (+) and a.title = c.originaltitle (+))

view.name: AppSoftware
view.columns: (Computer_Idn, Software_Idn, SoftwareType, ExeName, FileSize, FileDate, Title, Version, Path, AttRead, AttSystem, AttHidden, Notify_On_Change, AccessMask, DOSName, OrigFilename, OrigName, OrigVendor, OrigVersion, CompanyName, FileDesc, IntName, Copyright, Trademark, ProdName, ProdVers, Comments, PrivateBld, CreatorID, AssocRecs, Vendor, SCM_TotalSessionTime, SCM_SessionCount, SCM_SessionsDenied, SCM_LastUser, SCM_LastSessionStart, SCM_LastSessionTime, SCM_DaysSinceLastUsed, FileName, SCM_DateDiscovered, SCM_DaysSinceDiscovered, FileInfo_Idn, Virtual, MD5Hash, SHA1Hash, SHA256Hash, DigitallySigned, DigitalSigner, NetBytesReceived, NetBytesSent, AveMemAllocation, MaxMemAllocation, MaxCPUUsage, AveCPUUsage)

schema.view: SELECT COMPUTER_IDN, FILEINFOINSTANCE_IDN, SOFTWARETYPE, CASE WHEN B.TITLE = D.ORIGINALTITLE THEN D.NEWTITLE ELSE B.TITLE END AS EXENAME, B.FILESIZE, FILEDATE, CASE WHEN D.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL THEN D.NEWTITLE ELSE B.TITLE END AS TITLE, B.VERSION, PATH, ATTREAD, ATTSYSTEM, ATTHIDDEN, NOTIFY_ON_CHANGE, ACCESSMASK, DOSNAME, ORIGFILENAME, ORIGNAME, ORIGVENDOR, ORIGVERSION, COMPANYNAME, FILEDESC, INTNAME, COPYRIGHT, TRADEMARK, PRODNAME, PRODVERS, COMMENTS, PRIVATEBLD, CREATORID, ASSOCRECS, CASE WHEN (C.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL) THEN C.NEWVENDOR WHEN (D.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL) THEN D.NEWVENDOR ELSE B.VENDOR END AS VENDOR, SCM_TOTALSESSIONTIME, SCM_SESSIONCOUNT, SCM_SESSIONSDENIED, SCM_LASTUSER, SCM_LASTSESSIONSTART, SCM_LASTSESSIONTIME, DATEDIFF(DAY, SCM_LASTSESSIONSTART, GETDATE()), FILENAME, SCM_DATEDISCOVERED, DATEDIFF(DAY, SCM_DATEDISCOVERED, GETDATE()), A.FILEINFO_IDN, B.VIRTUAL, MD5Hash, SHA1Hash, SHA256Hash, DigitallySigned, DigitalSigner, NetBytesReceived, NetBytesSent, AveMemAllocation, MaxMemAllocation, MaxCPUUsage, AveCPUUsage from FILEINFOINSTANCE A JOIN FILEINFO B ON A.FILEINFO_IDN = B.FILEINFO_IDN LEFT JOIN ALIAS C on (B.VENDOR = C.ORIGINALVENDOR and C.ORIGINALTITLE IS NULL) LEFT JOIN ALIAS D ON (B.VENDOR = D.ORIGINALVENDOR and B.TITLE = D.ORIGINALTITLE)

view.name: AppSoftware
view.columns: (Computer_Idn, Software_Idn, SoftwareType, ExeName, FileSize, FileDate, Title, Version, Path, AttRead, AttSystem, AttHidden, Notify_On_Change, AccessMask, DOSName, OrigFilename, OrigName, OrigVendor, OrigVersion, CompanyName, FileDesc, IntName, Copyright, Trademark, ProdName, ProdVers, Comments, PrivateBld, CreatorID, AssocRecs, Vendor, SCM_TotalSessionTime, SCM_SessionCount, SCM_SessionsDenied, SCM_LastUser, SCM_LastSessionStart, SCM_LastSessionTime, SCM_DaysSinceLastUsed, FileName, SCM_DateDiscovered, SCM_DaysSinceDiscovered, FileInfo_Idn, Virtual, MD5Hash, SHA1Hash, SHA256Hash, DigitallySigned, DigitalSigner, NetBytesReceived, NetBytesSent, AveMemAllocation, MaxMemAllocation, MaxCPUUsage, AveCPUUsage)

schema.view: SELECT COMPUTER_IDN, FILEINFOINSTANCE_IDN, SOFTWARETYPE, CASE WHEN B.TITLE = D.ORIGINALTITLE THEN D.NEWTITLE ELSE B.TITLE END AS EXENAME, B.FILESIZE, FILEDATE, CASE WHEN D.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL THEN D.NEWTITLE ELSE B.TITLE END AS TITLE, B.VERSION, PATH, ATTREAD, ATTSYSTEM, ATTHIDDEN, NOTIFY_ON_CHANGE, ACCESSMASK, DOSNAME, ORIGFILENAME, ORIGNAME, ORIGVENDOR, ORIGVERSION, COMPANYNAME, FILEDESC, INTNAME, COPYRIGHT, TRADEMARK, PRODNAME, PRODVERS, COMMENTS, PRIVATEBLD, CREATORID, ASSOCRECS, CASE WHEN (C.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL) THEN C.NEWVENDOR WHEN (D.ORIGINALVENDOR IS NOT NULL) THEN D.NEWVENDOR ELSE B.VENDOR END AS VENDOR, SCM_TOTALSESSIONTIME, SCM_SESSIONCOUNT, SCM_SESSIONSDENIED, SCM_LASTUSER, SCM_LASTSESSIONSTART, SCM_LASTSESSIONTIME, TRUNC(SYSDATE - SCM_LASTSESSIONSTART), FILENAME, SCM_DATEDISCOVERED, TRUNC(SYSDATE - SCM_DATEDISCOVERED), A.FILEINFO_IDN, B.VIRTUAL, MD5Hash, SHA1Hash, SHA256Hash, DigitallySigned, DigitalSigner, NetBytesReceived, NetBytesSent, AveMemAllocation, MaxMemAllocation, MaxCPUUsage, AveCPUUsage from FILEINFOINSTANCE A , FILEINFO B, ALIAS C, ALIAS D where a.fileinfo_idn = b.fileinfo_idn and (b.vendor = c.originalvendor (+) and c.originaltitle (+) is null) and (b.vendor = d.originalvendor (+) and b.title = d.originaltitle (+))

view.name: ProductInstance
view.columns: (Computer_Idn, Product_Idn, Title, Version, ProductGUID, Name, Uninstall1, Uninstall2)

schema.view: SELECT PC.Computer_Idn, PC.Product_Idn, CASE WHEN P.Version IS NOT NULL THEN P.Title + ' (' + P.Version + ')' ELSE P.Title END as Title, P.Version, P.ProductGUID, M.Name, PC.Uninstall1, PC.Uninstall2 FROM PRODUCTCOMPUTER PC INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON PC.Product_Idn = P.Product_Idn LEFT JOIN SLM_MANUFACTURER M on P.Manufacturer_Idn = M.SLM_Manufacturer_Idn

view.name: ProductInstance
view.columns: (Computer_Idn, Product_Idn, Title, Version, ProductGUID, Name, Uninstall1, Uninstall2)

schema.view: SELECT PC.Computer_Idn, PC.Product_Idn, CASE WHEN P.Version IS NOT NULL THEN P.Title || ' (' || P.Version || ')' ELSE P.Title END as Title, P.Version, P.ProductGUID, M.Name, PC.Uninstall1, PC.Uninstall2 FROM PRODUCTCOMPUTER PC INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON PC.Product_Idn = P.Product_Idn LEFT JOIN SLM_MANUFACTURER M on P.Manufacturer_Idn = M.SLM_Manufacturer_Idn

select product_idn, fii.computer_idn, sum(nvl(scm_sessioncount, 0)), sum(cast(nvl(scm_totalsessiontime,0) as decimal)) / 60, max(nvl(scm_lastsessionstart,'')) from fileinfoinstance fii, Product p where fii.fileinfo_idn in ( select case when puf.FileInfo_Idn IS NULL then pf.fileinfo_idn else puf.FileInfo_Idn end from Product p2 left outer join productfile pf on pf.Product_Idn = p2.Product_Idn and (pf.include = 1 or pf.ismainexe = 1) left outer join SLM_ProductUsageFile puf on puf.Product_Idn = p2.product_idn where p2.Product_Idn = p.Product_Idn ) group by product_idn, computer_idn

select product_idn, fii.computer_idn, sum(isnull(scm_sessioncount, 0)), sum(cast(isnull(scm_totalsessiontime,0) as decimal)) / 60, max(isnull(scm_lastsessionstart,'')) from fileinfoinstance fii, Product p where fii.fileinfo_idn in ( select case when puf.FileInfo_Idn IS NULL then pf.fileinfo_idn else puf.FileInfo_Idn end from Product p2 left outer join productfile pf on pf.Product_Idn = p2.Product_Idn and (pf.include = 1 or pf.ismainexe = 1) left outer join SLM_ProductUsageFile puf on puf.Product_Idn = p2.product_idn where p2.Product_Idn = p.Product_Idn ) group by product_idn, computer_idn

view.name: UserManagementView
view.columns: (UserName, LastLogin, UserType, UseTimeFilter, StartHour, StopHour, OnSunday, OnMonday, OnTuesday, OnWednesday, OnThursday, OnFriday, OnSaturday, AuthServer, GroupName, RoleName, ScopeName, TeamName, ConsoleUser_Idn)

schema.view: select a.UserName, a.LastLogin, a.UserType, a.UseTimeFilter, a.StartHour, a.StopHour, a.OnSunday, a.OnMonday, a.OnTuesday, a.OnWednesday, a.OnThursday, a.OnFriday, a.OnSaturday, f.LDAP_SERVER_URL, c.UserName "GroupName", d.Name "RoleName", '' "ScopeName", '' "TeamName", a.ConsoleUser_Idn from ConsoleUser a LEFT OUTER JOIN APM_LDAP_SERVER f on a.apm_ldap_server_idn = f.APM_LDAP_SERVER_IDN, ConsoleUserGroup b, ConsoleUser c, CustomGroup d, CustomGroupConsoleUser e where a.ConsoleUser_Idn = b.User_Idn and b.Group_Idn = c.ConsoleUser_Idn and d.Type = 19 and d.CustomGroup_Idn = e.CustomGroup_Idn and e.Member_Idn = b.Group_Idn and a.UserType != 1 union all select a.UserName, a.LastLogin, a.UserType, a.UseTimeFilter, a.StartHour, a.StopHour, a.OnSunday, a.OnMonday, a.OnTuesday, a.OnWednesday, a.OnThursday, a.OnFriday, a.OnSaturday, f.LDAP_SERVER_URL,'', b.Name, '', '', a.ConsoleUser_Idn from ConsoleUser a LEFT OUTER JOIN APM_LDAP_SERVER f on a.apm_ldap_server_idn = f.APM_LDAP_SERVER_IDN, CustomGroup b, CustomGroupConsoleUser c where b.Type = 19 and b.CustomGroup_Idn = c.CustomGroup_Idn and c.Member_Idn = a.ConsoleUser_Idn and a.UserType != 1 union all select c.UserName, c.LastLogin, c.UserType, c.UseTimeFilter, c.StartHour, c.StopHour, c.OnSunday, c.OnMonday, c.OnTuesday, c.OnWednesday, c.OnThursday, c.OnFriday, c.OnSaturday, d.LDAP_SERVER_URL, '', '', a.name, '', c.ConsoleUser_Idn From Scope a, ConsoleUserScope b, ConsoleUser c LEFT OUTER JOIN APM_LDAP_SERVER d on c.apm_ldap_server_idn = d.APM_LDAP_SERVER_IDN where a.Scope_Idn = b.Scope_Idn and b.ConsoleUser_Idn = c.ConsoleUser_Idn and c.UserType != 1 union all select a.UserName, a.LastLogin, a.UserType, a.UseTimeFilter, a.StartHour, a.StopHour, a.OnSunday, a.OnMonday, a.OnTuesday, a.OnWednesday, a.OnThursday, a.OnFriday, a.OnSaturday, f.LDAP_SERVER_URL, '', '', d.name, '', a.ConsoleUser_Idn from ConsoleUser a, ConsoleUserGroup b, ConsoleUser c LEFT OUTER JOIN APM_LDAP_SERVER f on c.apm_ldap_server_idn = f.APM_LDAP_SERVER_IDN, Scope d, ConsoleUserScope e where a.ConsoleUser_Idn = b.User_Idn and b.Group_Idn = c.ConsoleUser_Idn and e.ConsoleUser_Idn = c.ConsoleUser_Idn and e.Scope_Idn = d.Scope_Idn and a.UserType != 1 union all select c.UserName, c.LastLogin, c.UserType, c.UseTimeFilter, c.StartHour, c.StopHour, c.OnSunday, c.OnMonday, c.OnTuesday, c.OnWednesday, c.OnThursday, c.OnFriday, c.OnSaturday, d.LDAP_SERVER_URL, '', '', '', a.UserName, a.ConsoleUser_Idn From ConsoleUser a, TeamConsoleUser b, ConsoleUser c LEFT OUTER JOIN APM_LDAP_SERVER d on c.apm_ldap_server_idn = d.APM_LDAP_SERVER_IDN where a.ConsoleUser_Idn = b.ParentConsoleUser_Idn and b.ConsoleUser_Idn = c.ConsoleUser_Idn and c.UserType != 1 union all select a.UserName, a.LastLogin, a.UserType, a.UseTimeFilter, a.StartHour, a.StopHour, a.OnSunday, a.OnMonday, a.OnTuesday, a.OnWednesday, a.OnThursday, a.OnFriday, a.OnSaturday, f.LDAP_SERVER_URL, '', '', '', d.UserName, a.ConsoleUser_Idn from ConsoleUser a, ConsoleUserGroup b, ConsoleUser c LEFT OUTER JOIN APM_LDAP_SERVER f on c.apm_ldap_server_idn = f.APM_LDAP_SERVER_IDN, ConsoleUser d, TeamConsoleUser e where a.ConsoleUser_Idn = b.User_Idn and b.Group_Idn = c.ConsoleUser_Idn and e.ConsoleUser_Idn = c.ConsoleUser_Idn and e.ParentConsoleUser_Idn = d.ConsoleUser_Idn and a.UserType != 1

schema.function:
DECLARE @returnVal int if exists ( select pc1.Product_Idn from ProductComputer pc join SLM_ProductSuiteRef ref on ref.Product_Idn = pc.Product_Idn join ProductComputer pc1 on pc1.Product_Idn = ref.ProductSuite_Idn and pc1.Computer_Idn = @computerId where pc.Computer_idn = @computerId and pc.Product_Idn = @productId ) set @returnVal = 1; else set @returnVal = 0;
return @returnVal;

DECLARE @type varchar(100) if #DATABASE_OWNER#.IsChildProduct(@productId, @computerId) = 1 set @type = 'Member of suite'; else begin select @type = case when LDMSProduct = 2 then 'Suite' else 'Single' end from Product where Product_Idn = @productId end
return @type;
schema.trigger: WITH BNF (MetaObjRelations_Idn, Def, ParentRel_Idn, MetaObjects_Idn) AS ( SELECT MetaObjRelations_Idn, cast(a.DEF as nvarchar(1024)), b.ParentRel_Idn, b.MetaObjects_Idn FROM {0}.MetaObjects a, {0}.MetaObjRelations b WHERE a.MetaObjects_Idn = b.MetaObjects_Idn AND b.ParentRel_Idn = 0 UNION ALL SELECT b.MetaObjRelations_Idn, cast(c.DEF + '.' + a.DEF as nvarchar(1024)), b.ParentRel_Idn, b.MetaObjects_Idn FROM {0}.MetaObjects a, {0}.MetaObjRelations b, BNF c WHERE a.MetaObjects_Idn = b.MetaObjects_Idn AND b.ParentRel_Idn = c.MetaObjRelations_Idn ) UPDATE MetaObjRelations SET BNF = a.DEF FROM BNF a{1} WHERE MetaObjRelations.MetaObjRelations_Idn = a.MetaObjRelations_Idn{2}
